title: error: internal compiler error: librustc_typeck/check/mod.rs:851: can't type-check body of DefId(0/0:3 ~ rust_out[317d]::Foo[0])

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Input:
```
struct Foo (
        fn([u8; |x: u8| { }])
);
```
